forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow this morning. The rain and snow will change to all rain by the afternoon hours. High 2C. Winds E at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of precip 90%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Temps nearly steady in the mid 30s. Winds E at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers this evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low 1C. Winds ESE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers this evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low 34F. Winds ESE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 6C. Winds ESE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 43F. Winds ESE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 3C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 37F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Thunderstorms in the morning, then variable clouds during the afternoon with still a chance of showers. High 6C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Thunderstorms in the morning followed by occasional showers in the afternoon. High 44F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 37F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with overcast skies late. Low 34F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 43F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 1C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 34F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.
